title: North Berwick
name: Bass Rock
content: The world's largest single rock gannet colony on Bass Rock at close quarters. [http://www.seabird.org/boats/seabird-boat-trips/14/162 Boat trips] are offered by the Scottish Seabird Center from the harbour. There are 1 hour trips that take you round costing 22 pounds adult single, and 5.5 hour trips that take you onto the bass rock itself, costing 98 pounds. These need to be booked in advanced and also include a session where they feed the garnets off the boat so you get to look at them diving into the waters up close.
